GE07bhg4c04u:2: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam |
GE07bhg4c04u:8: tad evaṃ brahmārpaṇādi-guṇa-vidhānena tattvaṃ padārtha-vivekādinā ca prapañciṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat parasparāprāptatvena stuvan bhagavān uvāca imam iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:10: imaṃ yogaṃ purāham vivasvata ādityāya kathitavān |
GE07bhg4c04u:14_0: yadyapi pūrvam upeyatvena jñāna-yogas tad-upāyatvena ca karma-yoga iti dvau yogau
GE07bhg4c04u:14_1: kathitau tathāpi ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca paśyati sa paśyati [Gītā 5.6] ity anayā
GE07bhg4c04u:14_2: diśā sādhya-sādhanayoḥ phalaikyād aikyam upacarya sādhana-bhūtaṃ karma-yogaṃ sādhya-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:14_3: ca jñāna-yogam aneka-vidha-guṇa-vidhānāya stauti vaṃśa-kathanena bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c04u:15_0: imam adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ yogaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ karma-niṣṭhopāya-labhyaṃ vivasvate
GE07bhg4c04u:15_2: ahaṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sarva-jagat-paripālakaḥ sargādi-kāle rājñāṃ balādhānena tad-adhīnaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:16: katham anena balādhānam iti viśeṣeṇena darśayati -- avyayam avyaya-veda-mūlatvād avyaya-phalatvāc ca na vyeti sva-phalād ity avyayam avyabhicāri-phalam |
GE07bhg4c04u:17: tathā caitādṛśena balādhānaṃ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:18: sa ca mama śiṣyo vivasvān manave vaivasvatāya sva-putrāya prāha |
GE07bhg4c04u:20: yadyapi prati manvantaraṃ svāyambhuvādi-sādhāraṇo 'yaṃ bhāgavad-updeśas tathāpi sāmpratika-vaivasvata-manvantarābhi-prāyeṇādityam ārabhya sampradāyo gaṇitaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c04u:24: adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ niṣkāma-karma-sādhyaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ stauti imam iti ||1||
GE07bhg4c04u:30: pūrvādhyāyābhyām uktaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ karma-yogaṃ caika-phalatvād ekīkṛtya tad-vaṃśaṃ kīrtayan stauti imam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:32: avyayaṃ nityaṃ vedārtahtvān naveyeti sva-phalādityavyabhicāri-phalatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:33: sa ca mac-chiṣyo vivasvān sva-putrāya manave vaivasvatāya prāha |
GE07bhg4c04u:38: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ parantapa ||2||
GE07bhg4c04u:40: evaṃ rājānaś ca te ṛṣayaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c04u:42: sva-pitrādibhir ikṣvāku-pramukhaiḥ protkam imaṃ yogam vidur jānanti sma |
GE07bhg4c04u:43: adyatanānām ajñāne kāraṇam āha he parantapa śatru-pātana ! sa yogaḥ kāla-vaśād iha loke naṣṭo vicchinnaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c04u:45_0: evam ādityam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam imaṃ yogaṃ rājānaś ca ta ṛṣayaś
GE07bhg4c04u:45_1: ceti rājarṣayaḥ prabhutve sati sūkṣmārtha-nirīkṣaṇa-kṣamā nimi-pramukhāḥ sva-pitrādi-proktaṃ viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:46: tasmād anādi-veda-mūlatvenānanta-phalatvenānādi-guru-śiṣya-paramparā-prāptatvena ca kṛtrimatva-śaṅkānāspadatvān mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ yoga iti śraddhātiśayāya stūyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:47_0: sa evaṃ mahā-prayojano 'pi yogaḥ kālena mahatā dīrgheṇa dharma-hrāsa-kareṇehedānīm
GE07bhg4c04u:47_1: āvayor vyavahāra-kāle dvāparānte durbalān ajitendriyān anadhikāriṇaḥ prāpya kāma-krodhādibhir
GE07bhg4c04u:48: taṃ vinā puruṣārthāprāpter aho daurbhāgyaṃ lokasyeti śocati bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c04u:49: he parantapa ! paraṃ kāma-krodhādi-rūpaṃ śatru-gaṇaṃ śauryeṇa balavatā vivekena tapasā ca bhānur iva tāpayatīti parantapaḥ śatru-tāpano jitendriya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:54: evaṃ vivasvantam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam iimaṃ yogaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sva-pitrādibhir ikṣvāku-prabhṛtibhir upadiṣṭaṃ viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:58: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:59: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam ||3||
GE07bhg4c04u:61: sa evāyaṃ yogo 'dya vicchinne sampradāye sati punaś ca te tubhyam uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:62: yatas tvaṃ mama bhakto 'si sakhā ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:65: madhusūdanaḥ : ya evaṃ pūrvam upadiṣṭo 'py adhikārya-bhāvād vicchinna-sampradāyo 'bhūt |
GE07bhg4c04u:66: yaṃ vinā ca puruṣārtho na labhyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:67: sa evāyaṃ purātano 'nādi-guru-paramparā-gato yogo 'dya sampradāya-viccheda-kāle mayātisnigdhena te tubhyaṃ prakarṣeṇoktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:71: yasmāt tvaṃ mama bhaktaḥ śaraṇāgatatve saty atyanta-prītimān sakhā ca samāna-vayāḥ snigdha-sahāyo 'si sarvadā bhavasi atas tubhyam ukta ity arthaḥ anyasmai kuto nocyate tatrāha |
GE07bhg4c04u:72: hi yasmād etaj jñānam uttamaṃ rahasyam atigopyam ||3||
GE07bhg4c04u:73: viśvanāthaḥ : tvāṃ praty evāsya proktatve hetuḥ : bhakto dāsaḥ sakhā ceti bhāva-dvayam |
GE07bhg4c04u:74: anyas tu arvācīnaṃ praty eva avaktavyatve hetū rahasyam iti ||3||
GE07bhg4c04u:76_0: sa eva tadānupūrvika-vacana-vācyo yogo mayā tvat-sakhenātisnigdhena te tubhyaṃ mat-sakhāyeti
GE07bhg4c04u:76_1: snigdhāya proktas tvaṃ me bhaktaḥ prapannaḥ sakhā cāsīti hetor na tv anyasmai kasmaicit |
GE07bhg4c04u:78: hi yasmād uttamaṃ rahasyam iti gopyam etat ||3||
GE07bhg4c04u:82: aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:83: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:84: śrīdharaḥ : bhagavato vivasvantaṃ prati yogopadeśāsambhavaṃ paśyann arjuna uvāca aparam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:87: tasmāt tavādhunātanatvāt cirantanāya vivasvate tvam ādau yogaṃ proktavān iti etat katham ahaṃ jānīyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyām ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:89: yā bhagavati vāsudeve manuṣyatvenāsarvajñatvānityatvāśaṅkā mūrkhāṇāṃ tām apanetum anuvadann arjuna āśaṅkate - aparam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:90: aparam alpa-kālīnam idānantanaṃ vasudeva-gṛhe bhavato janma śarīra-grahaṇaṃ vihīnaṃ ca manuṣyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:91: paraṃ bahu-kālīnaṃ sargādi-bhavam utkṛṣṭaṃ ca devatvāt, vivasvato janma |
GE07bhg4c04u:96: tvam idānīṃtano manuṣyo 'sarvajñaḥ sargādau pūrvatanāya sarvajñāyādityāya proktavān iti viruddhārtham etad iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:98: etad dehānavacchinnasya tava dehāntarāvacchedena vādityaṃ pratyupadeṣṭṛtvam etad-dehena vā |
GE07bhg4c04u:103: tad uktam abhiyuktaiḥ janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryate iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:105: tad evaṃ dehāntareṇa sargādau sad-bhāvānupappattir ity asarvajñatvānityatvābhyāṃ dvāv arjunasya pūrva-pakṣau ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:106: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam artham asambhavaṃ pṛcchati aparam idānīntanam |
GE07bhg4c04u:107: paraṃ purātanam ataḥ katham etat pratyemīti bhāvaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:109: kṛṣṇasya sanātanatve sārvajñe ca śaṅkamānān anabhijñān nirākartum arjuna uvāca aparam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:110: aparam arvācīnaṃ paraṃ parācīnaṃ tasmād ādhunikas tvaṃ prācīnāya vivasvate yogam uktavān ity etat katham ahaṃ vijānīyāṃ pratīyām |
GE07bhg4c04u:112: na khalu sarveśvaratvena kṛṣṇam arjuno na vetti tasya narākhya-tad-avatāratvena tādrūpyāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:113: paraṃ dhāma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi tad-ukteś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:114: na tv atat-sarvajña-viṣayām ajña-śaṅkām apākartum aparam ity ādi pṛcchati |
GE07bhg4c04u:115: sarveśvaraḥ sa yathā sva-tattvaṃ vetti na tathānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:116: tatas tan-mukhāmbujād eva tad-rūpa-taj-janmādi parkāśanīyaṃ loka-maṅgalāya |
GE07bhg4c04u:117: tad-arthaṃ sva-mahimānaṃ pravadan vikatthanatayā sa nākṣepyaḥ, kintu stavanīya eva kṛpālutayā |
GE07bhg4c04u:118: tac ca manuṣākṛti-para-brahmaṇas tava rūpaṃ janmādi ca loka-vilakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:119: kiṃ-vidhaṃ kim-arthakaṃ kiṃ-kālam iti vijñasyāpy ājñavat praśno 'yam ajña-śaṅkā-nirāsaka-prativacanārthaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:123: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna |
GE07bhg4c04u:124: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha parantapa ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:125: śrīdharaḥ : rūpāntareṇopadiṣṭavān ity abhiprāyeṇottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca bahūnīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:128: tvaṃ tu na vettha na vetsi avidyāvṛttatvāt ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:129: madhusūdanaḥ : tatra sarvajñatvena prathamasya parihāram āha bahūnīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:130: janmāni līlā-deha-grahaṇāni loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyeṇādityasyodayavan me mama bahūni vyatītāni tava cājñāninaḥ karmārjitāni deha-grahaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c04u:131: tava cety upalakṣaṇam itareṣām api jīvānāṃ, jīvaikyābhiprāyeṇa vā |
GE07bhg4c04u:133: tāni janmāny ahaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarva-śaktir īśvaro veda jānāmi sarvāṇi madīyāni tvadīyāny anyadīyāni ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:134: na tvam ajño jīvas tirobhūta-jñāna-śaktir vettha na jānāsi svīyāny api kiṃ punaḥ parakīyāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:135: he parantapa ! paraṃ śatruṃ bheda-dṛṣṭyā parikalpya hantuṃ pravṛtto 'sīti viparīta-darśitatvād bhrānto 'sīti sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c04u:136: tad anena sambodhana-dvayenāvaraṇa-vikṣepau dvāv apy ajñāna-dharmau darśitau
GE07bhg4c04u:139: tava ceti yadā yadaiva mamāvatāras tadā mat-pārṣadatvāt tavāpy āvirbhāvo 'bhūd evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:141: tvaṃ na vettha mayaiva sva-līlā-siddhy-arthaṃ tvaj-jñānāvaraṇād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:142: ataeva he parantapa ! sāmpratika-kuntī-putratvābhimāna-mātreṇaiva parān śatrūṃs tāpayasi ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:144_0: eka evāhaṃ eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti ity ādi śruty-uktāni nitya-siddhāni bahūni
GE07bhg4c04u:144_1: rūpāṇi vaidūryavad ātmani dadhānaḥ purā rūpāntareṇa taṃ pratyupadiṣṭavān iti bhāvenāha bhagavān bahūnīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:145: tava ceti mat-sakhatvāt tāvanti janmāni tavāpy abhūvann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:147: idānīṃ mayaivācintya-śaktyā sva-līlā-siddhaye tvaj-jñānācchādanād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:150: bahūnītyādi śrī-mukhoktes tava ceti dṛṣṭāntāc ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:151: na ca janmākhyo vikāras tasyāgrima-vyākhyayā pratyākhyānāt ||5||
GE07bhg4c04u:154: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san |

GE07bhg4c04u:157: avināśinaś ca kathaṃ punar janma yena bahūni me vyatītānity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:158: īśvarasya tava puṇya-pāpa-vihīnasya kathaṃ jīvavaj janmeti ? ata āha ajo 'pīti |

GE07bhg4c04u:168_0: nanv atītāneka-janma-vattvam ātmanaḥ smarasi cet tarhi jāti-smaro jīvas tvaṃ para-janma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c04u:168_1: api yoginaḥ sārvātmyābhimānena śāstra-dṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāma-devavat [Vs 1.1.30] iti
GE07bhg4c04u:169: tathā cāha vāmadevo jīvo 'pi ahaṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvānṛpir asmi vipraḥity ādi dāśatayyām |
GE07bhg4c04u:171: tathā ca katham ādityaṃ sarvajñam upadiṣṭavān asy anīśvaraḥ san |
GE07bhg4c04u:172: na hi jīvasya mukhyaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sambhavati vyaṣṭy-upādheḥ paricchinnatvena sarva-sambandhitvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:173: samaṣṭy-upādher api virājaḥ sthūla-bhūtopādhitvena sūkṣma-bhūta-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ māyā-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ na sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:176: tasmād īśvara eva kāraṇopāditvād atītān āgata-vartamāna-sarvārtha-viṣaya-jñānavān mukhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:177: atītān āgata-vartamāna-viṣayaṃ māyā-vṛtti-trayam ekaiva vā sarva-viṣayā māyā-vṛttir ity anyat |
GE07bhg4c04u:178: tasya ca nityeśvarasya sarvajñasya dharmādharmādy-abhāvena janmaivānupapannam atītāneka-janmavattvaṃ tu dūrotsāritam eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:179: tathā ca jīvatve sārvajñyānupapattir īśvaratve ca deha-grahaṇānupapattir iti śaṅkā-dvayaṃ pariharann anityatva-pakṣasyāpi parihāram āha ajo 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:182: yad ubhayaṃ tārkikaiḥ prety abhāva ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:183: tad uktaṃ jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca [Gītā 2.27] iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:185: dharmādharma-vaśatvaṃ cājñasya jīvasaya dehābhimāninaḥ karmādhikāritvād bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:186: tatra yad ucyate sarvajñasyeśvarasya sarva-kāraṇasyedṛg-deha-grahaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti tat tathaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:188: yadi tasya śarīraṃ sthūla-bhūta-kāryaṃ syāt tadā vyaṣṭi-rūpatve jāgrad-avasthāsmad-ādi-tulyatvam |
GE07bhg4c04u:194: na ca jīvāviṣṭa eva tādṛśe śarīre tasya bhūtāveśavat praveśa iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:195: tac-charīrāvacchedena taj-jīvasya bhogābhyupagame 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa sarva-śarīra-praveśasya vidyamānatvena śarīra-viśeṣābhyupagama-vaiyarthyāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:197: ato na bhautikaṃ śarīram īśvarasyeti pūrvārdhenāṅgīkaroti -- ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi sann iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:198_0: ajo 'pi sann ity apūrva-deha-grahaṇam avyayātmāpi sann iti pūrva-deha-vicchedaṃ bhūtānāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:198_1: bhagava-dharmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ brahmādi-stamba-paryantānām īśvaro 'pi sann iti dharmādharma-vaśatvaṃ nivārayati |
GE07bhg4c04u:199: kathaṃ tarhi deha-grahaṇam ity uttarārdhenāha prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya sambhavāmi |

GE07bhg4c04u:200_1: adhiṣṭhāya cid-ābhāsena vaśīkṛtya sambhavāmi tat-pariṇāma-viśeṣair eva jagat-kāraṇatva-sampādikā
GE07bhg4c04u:200_2: mad-icchayaiva pravartamānā viśuddha-sattva-mayatvena mama mūrtis tad-viśiṣṭasya
GE07bhg4c04u:201: ato 'nena nityenaiva dehena vivasvantaṃ ca tvāṃ ca pratīmaṃ yogam upadiṣṭavān aham ity upapannam |
GE07bhg4c04u:202: tathā ca śrutiḥ - ākāśa-śarīraṃ brahma iti | ākāśo
GE07bhg4c04u:204: ākāśa eva tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ca [BAU 3.8.7] ity ādau tathā darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:206: tarhi bhautika-vigrahābhāvāt tad-dharma-manuṣyatvādi-pratītiḥ katham iti cet tatrāha ātma-māyayeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:207: man-māyayaiva mayi manuṣyatvādi-pratītir lokānugrahāya na tu vastu-vṛttyeti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:209: māyā hy eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yan māṃ paśyasi nārada |
GE07bhg4c04u:210: sarva-bhūta-guṇair yuktaṃ na tu māṃ draṣṭum arhasi || [Mbh 12.326.43] iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:211: sarva-bhūta-guṇair yuktaṃ kāraṇopādhiṃ māṃ carma-cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ nārhasīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:212_0: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa - sa ca bhagavān jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ

GE07bhg4c04u:213: vyākhyātṛbhiś coktaṃ svecchā-vinirmitena māyāmayena divyena rūpeṇa sambabhūveti |

GE07bhg4c04u:395: itarathā tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutir vyākupyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:397: janmādi-nityatāyāṃ yuktayas tv anyatra vistṛtā draṣṭavyāḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c04u:402: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ janma-karma-jñānena tvat-prāptiḥ syād iti ? ata āha vīta-rāgeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:403: ahaṃ śuddha-sattvāvatāraiḥ dharma-pālanaṃ karomīti madīyaṃ parama-kāruṇikatvaṃ jñātvā |
GE07bhg4c04u:410: na tv adhunaiva pravṛtto 'yaṃ mad-bhakti-mārga ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:411_0: tad evaṃ tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇīty ādinā vidyāvidyopādhibhyāṃ tat-tvaṃ-padārthāv īśvara-jīvau
GE07bhg4c04u:411_2: śuddhasya sataś cid-aṃśena tadaikyam uktam iti draṣṭavyam ||10 ||
GE07bhg4c04u:413: mām eti so 'rjunety uktaṃ tatra svasya sarva-mukta-prāpyatayā puruṣārthatvam asya mokṣa-mārgasyānādi-parasparāgatatvaṃ ca darśayati vīta-rāgeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:415: sarvān viṣayān parityajya jñāna-mārge kathaṃ jīvitavyam iti trāso bhayam |
GE07bhg4c04u:416: sarva-viṣayocchedako 'yaṃ jñāna-mārgaḥ kathaṃ hitaḥ syād iti dveṣaḥ krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:417: ta ete rāga-bhaya-krodhā vītā vivekena vigatā yebhyas te vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ śuddha-sattvāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:419: bahavo 'neke jñāna-tapasā jñānam eva tapaḥ sarva-karma-kṣaya-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:420: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate iti hi vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:424: jñāna-tapasā pūtā jīvan-muktāḥ santo mad-bhāvaṃ mad-viṣayaṃ bhāvaṃ raty-ākhyaṃ premāṇam āgatā iti vā |
GE07bhg4c04u:425: teṣāṃ jñānī nitya-yuktā eka-bhaktir viśiṣyate iti hi vakṣyati ||10||
GE07bhg4c04u:426: viśvanāthaḥ : na kevalam eka evādhunika eva,
GE07bhg4c04u:427: maj-janma-karma-tattva-jñāna-mātreṇaiva māṃ prāpnoty api tu prāktanā api pūrva-pūrva-kalpāvatīrṇasya mama janma-karma-tattva-jñānavanto mām āpur evety āha vīteti |
GE07bhg4c04u:428: jñānam ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ maj-janma-karmaṇos tattvato 'nubhava-rūpam eva tapas tena pūtāḥ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:430: jñāne maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatva-niścayānubhave yan-nānā-kumata-kutarka-yukti-sarpī-viṣa-dāha-sahana-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:431: tathā ca śrī-rāmānuja-dhṛta-śrutiḥ - tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yoniṃ iti dhīrā dhīmanta eva tasya yoniṃ janma-prakāraṃ jānantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:432: vītās tyaktāḥ kumata-prajalpiteṣu janeṣu rāgādyā yais te na teṣu rāgaḥ prītir nāpi tebhyo bhayaṃ nāpi teṣu krodho mad-bhaktānām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:436: idānīm iva purāpi maj-janmādi-nityatā-jñānena bahūnāṃ vimuktir abhūd iti tan-nityatāṃ draḍhayitum āha vīteti |
GE07bhg4c04u:437: bahavo janā jñāna-tapasā pūtāḥ santaḥ purā mad-bhāvam āgatā ity anuṣaṅgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:438_0: maj-janmādi-nityatva-viṣayakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad eva duradhigama-śruti-yukti-sampādyatvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:438_1: tapas tasmin jñāne vā yad vividha-kumata-kutarkādi-nivāraṇa-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtā
GE07bhg4c04u:439: mayi bhāvaṃ premāṇaṃ vidyamānatāṃ vā mat-sākṣāt-kṛtim |
GE07bhg4c04u:441: vītāḥ parityaktās tan-nityatva-virodhiṣu rāgādayo yais te,
GE07bhg4c04u:442: na teṣu rāgaṃ na bhayaṃ na ca krodhaṃ prakāśayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:443: tatra hetuḥ - man-mayā mad-eka-niṣṭhā upāśritāḥ saṃsevamānāḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c04u:446: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham |
GE07bhg4c04u:448: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tarhi kiṃ tvayy api vaiṣamyam asti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:449: yad evaṃ tvad-eka-śaraṇānām evātmābhāvaṃ dadāsi nānyeṣāṃ sakāmānām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:451: yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā vā ye māṃ bhajante tān ahaṃ tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānena bhajāmi anugṛhṇāmi,
GE07bhg4c04u:452: na tu sakāmā māṃ vihāyendrādīn eva ye bhajante tān aham upekṣa iti mantavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:453: yataḥ sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādi-sevakā api mamaiva vartma bhajana-mārgam anuvartante |
GE07bhg4c04u:455: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu ye jñāna-tapasā pūtā niṣkāmās te tvad-bhāvaṃ gacchanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:456: ye tv apūtāḥ sakāmās te na gacchantīti phala-dātus tava vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye syātām iti nety āha ye yatheti |
GE07bhg4c04u:457_0: ya ārtā arthārthino jijñāsavo jñāninaś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā
GE07bhg4c04u:457_1: ca mām īśvaraṃ sarva-phala-dātāraṃ prapadyante bhajanti tāṃs tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānenaiva
GE07bhg4c04u:459: jiijñāsūn vividiṣanti yajñenety ādi-śruti-vihita-niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhātṝn jñāna-dānena jñāninaś ca mumukṣūn mokṣa-dānena na tv anya-kāmāyānyad dadāmīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:460_0: nanu tathāpi sva-bhaktānām eva phalaṃ dadāsi na tv anya-deva-bhaktānām iti vaiṣamyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:460_1: sthitam eveti nety āha mama sarvātmano vāsudevasya vartma bhajana-mārgaṃ karma-jñāna-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:460_2: anuvartante he pārtha sarvajñaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādīn apy anuvartamānā manuṣyā
GE07bhg4c04u:461: indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ity ādi-mantra-varṇāt phalam ata upapatteḥ [Vs. 3.2.38] iti nyāyāc ca sarva-rūpeṇāpi phala-dātā bhagavān eka evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:462: tathā ca vakṣyati ye 'py anya-devatā-bhaktā [Gītā 9.23] ity ādi ||11||
GE07bhg4c04u:463: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu tvad-ekānta-bhaktāḥ kilataj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ manyanta eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:464: kecit tu jñānādi-siddhy-arthaṃ tvāṃ prapannā jñāni-prabhṛtayas tvaj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ nāpi manyanta iti tatrāha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:465: yathā yena prakāreṇa māṃ prapadyante bhajante aham api tāṃs tenaiva prakāreṇa bhajāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:467_0: ayam arthaḥ - ye mat-prabhor janma-karmaṇī nitye eveti manasi kurvāṇās tat-tal-līlāyām
GE07bhg4c04u:467_1: eva kṛta-manoratha-viśeṣā māṃ bhajantaḥ sukhayanty aham apīśvaratvāt kartum akartum
GE07bhg4c04u:467_2: anyathā kartum api samarthas teṣām api janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ kartuṃ tān sva-pārṣadīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c04u:467_3: taiḥ sārdham eva yathā-samayam avatarann antar dadhānaś ca tān pratikṣaṇam anugṛhṇann
GE07bhg4c04u:468_0: ye jñāni-prabhṛtayo maj-janma-karmaṇor naśvaratvaṃ mad-vigrahasya māyā-mayatvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c04u:468_1: manyamānā māṃ prapadyante aham api tān punaḥ punar naśvara-janma-karmavato māyā-pāśa-patitān
GE07bhg4c04u:468_2: eva kurvāṇas tat-pratiphalaṃ janma-mṛtyu-duḥkham eva dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:469: ye tu maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ mad-vigrahasya ca sac-cid-ānandatvaṃ manyamānā jñāninaḥ sva-jñāna-siddhy-arthaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:471: teṣāṃ sva-deha-dvaya-bhaṅgam evecchatāṃ mumukṣūṇām anaśvaraṃ brahmānandam eva sampādayan bhajana-phalam āvidyaka-janma-mṛtyu-dhvaṃsam eva dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:472: tasmān na kevalaṃ mad-bhaktā eva māṃ prapadyante,
GE07bhg4c04u:473_0: api tu sarvaśaḥ sarve 'pi manuṣyā jñāninaḥ karmiṇo yoginaś ca devatāntaropāsakāś
GE07bhg4c04u:473_1: ca mama vartmānuvartante mama sarva-svarūpatvāt jñāna-karmādikaṃ sarvaṃ māmakam eva
GE07bhg4c04u:475: nanu nitya-janmādi-manojñaḥ sarveśvaras tvaṃ mayāvagata-kvacittvaṅguṣṭha-mātrādir apīśvaro janmādi-śūnyaḥ śrūyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:476: tat kiṃ tava tvad-upāsanasya ca vaividhyaṃ bhaved iti ced om ity āha ye yatheti |
GE07bhg4c04u:477: ye bhaktā mām ekaṃ vaidūryam iva bahu-rūpaṃ sarveśvaraṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāveneti yāvat prapadyante bhajanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:478: tān ahaṃ tādṛśas tathaiva tad-bhāvānusāriṇā rūpeṇa bhāvena ca bhajāmi sākṣāt bhavann anugṛhṇāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:480: ato mamaikasyaiva bahu-rūpasya vartma-bahu-vidham upāsana-mārgam anādi-pravṛtta-tad-upāsaka-paramparānukampitā manuṣyāḥ sarve 'nuvartante anusaranti ||11||
GE07bhg4c04u:483: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:484: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā ||12||
GE07bhg4c04u:485: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi mokṣārtham eva kim iti sarve tvāṃ na bhajantīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:487: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ karma-phalaṃ kāṅkṣantaḥ prāyeneha mānuṣya-loke indrādi-devatā eva yajante |
GE07bhg4c04u:489: hi yasmāt karmajā siddhiḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:490: na tu jñāna-phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ, duṣprāpyatvāj jñānasya ||12||
GE07bhg4c04u:492: nanu tvām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kim iti sarve na prapadyanta iti tatrāha kāṅkṣanta iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:493: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ phala-niṣpattiṃ kāṅkṣanta iha loke devatā devān indrāgny-ādyān yajante pūjayanti ajñāna-pratihatatvān na tu niṣkāmāḥ santo māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam iti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:495: hi yasmād indrādi-devatā-yājināṃ tat-phala-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ karmajā siddhiḥ karma-janyaṃ phalaṃ kṣipraṃ śīghram eva bhavati mānuṣe loke |
GE07bhg4c04u:496: jñāna-phalaṃ tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sāpekṣatvān na kṣipraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:497: mānuṣe loke karma-phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavatīti viśeṣaṇād anya-loke 'pi varṇāśrama-dharma-vyatirikta-karma-phala-siddhir bhagavatā sūcitā |
GE07bhg4c04u:498: yatas tat tat kṣudra-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ sa-kāmā mokṣa-vimukhā anyā devatā yajante 'to na mumukṣava iva māṃ vāsudevaṃ sākṣāt te prapadyanta ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c04u:500: tatrāpi manuṣyeṣu madhye kāminas tu mama sākṣād-bhūtam api bhakti-mārgaṃ parihāya śīghra-phala-sādhakaṃ karma-vartmaivānuvartanta ity āha kāṅkṣanta iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:503: evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ procya prakṛtasya niṣkāma-karmaṇo jñānākāratvaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tad anuṣṭhātuṃ viralatvam āha kāṅkṣanta iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:504_0: iha loke 'nādi-bhoga-vāsanā-niyantritāḥ prāṇinaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ paśuputrādi-phala-niṣpattiṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:504_1: kāṅkṣanto 'nityālpa-dān apīndrādi-devān yajante sakāmaiḥ karmabhir na tu sarva-deveśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:504_2: nityānanda-phala-pradam api māṃ niṣkāmais tair yajante |
GE07bhg4c04u:505: hi yasmād asmin mānuṣe loke karmajā siddhiḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:506: niṣkāma-karmārādhitān matto jñānato mokṣa-lakṣaṇā siddhis tu cireṇaiva bhavatīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:507: sarve lokā bhoga-vāsanā-grasta-sad-asad-vivekāḥ śīghra-bhogecchavas tad-arthaṃ mad-bhṛtyān devān bhajanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:508: na tu kaścit sad-asad-vivekī saṃsāra-duḥkha-vitrasta-duḥkha-nivṛttaye niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ sarva-deveśaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:513: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam ||13||
GE07bhg4c04u:514: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kecit sakāmatayā pravartante, kecit niṣkāmatayā iti karma-vaicitryam |
GE07bhg4c04u:515: tat-kartṛṇā ca brāhmaṇādīnām uttama-madhyamādi-vaicitryaṃ kurvatas tava kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nāsti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:517: catvāro varṇā eveti cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ-pratyayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:518: ayam arthaḥ -- sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:519: sattva- rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ śaurya-yuddhādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:520: rajas- tamaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ kṛṣi-vāṇijyādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:522: ity evaṃ guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś cāturvarṇyaṃ mayaiva sṛṣṭam iti satyam,
GE07bhg4c04u:523: tathāpy evaṃ tasya kartāram api phalato 'kartāram eva māṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c04u:526: madhusūdanaḥ : śarīrārambhaka-guṇa-vaiṣamyād api na sarve samāna-svabhāvā ity āha cāturvarṇyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:527: catvāro varṇā eva cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ |
GE07bhg4c04u:528: mayeśvareṇa sṛṣṭam utpāditaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇa-vibhāgaśaḥ karma-vibhāgaśaś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:529: tathā hi sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ ca sāttvikāni śama-damādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:530: sattvopasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ ca tādṛśāni śaurya-tejaḥ-prabhṛtīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:531: tama-upasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ ca kṛṣy-ādīni tādṛśāni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:532: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ ca tāmasāni traivarṇika-śuśrūṣādīni karmāṇīti mānuṣe loke vyavasthitāni |
GE07bhg4c04u:533_0: evaṃ tarhi viṣama-svabhāva-cāturvarṇya-sraṣṭṛtena tava vaiṣamyaṃ durvāram ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c04u:533_1: nety āha tasya viṣama-svabhāvasya cāturvarṇyasya vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā kartāram api māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:535: karma-mārgas tu bandhaka iti sarva-mārga-sraṣṭari tvayi parameśvare vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktam |
GE07bhg4c04u:536: tatra nahi nahīty āha cāturvarṇyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:539: atra sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi |
GE07bhg4c04u:542: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ paricaryātmakaṃ karmety evaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś catvāro varṇā mayā dharma-mārgāśritatvena sṛṣṭāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:543: kintu teṣāṃ kartāraṃ sraṣṭāram api mām akartāram asraṣṭāram eva viddhi |
GE07bhg4c04u:546: sraṣṭāram api māṃ vastutas tv asraṣṭāram |
GE07bhg4c04u:549: sraṣṭṛtve 'pi na sāmyaṃ kiṃcid evety arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c04u:556: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ viprādi-trika-paricaryādīnīti guṇa-vibhāgaiḥ karma-vibhāgaiś ca vibhaktāś catvāro varṇāḥ sarveśvareṇa mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sthiti-saṃhṛtyor upalakṣaṇam etat |
GE07bhg4c04u:558: yad āha sūtrakāraḥ - janmādy asya yataḥ [Vs 1.1.2] iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:559: tasya sargādeḥ kartāram api māṃ tat tat karmāntaritatvād akartāraṃ viddhīti svasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ parihṛtam
GE07bhg4c04u:560: | etat prāhāvyayaym iti sraṣṭṛtve 'pi sāmyān na vyemīty arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c04u:563: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karma-phale spṛhā |
GE07bhg4c04u:564: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:565: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva darśayann āha na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:566: karmāṇi viśva-sṛṣṭy-ādīny api māṃ na limpanty āsaktaṃ na kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:569: yataḥ karma-lepa-rahitatvena māṃ yo 'bhijānāti so 'pi karmabhir na badhyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:570: mama nirlepatve kāraṇaṃ nirahaṅkāratva-niḥspṛhatvādikaṃ jānatas tasyāpy ahaṅkārādi-śaithilyāt ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:572: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ nirahaṅkāratvena kartṛtvena kartṛtvābhimāna-hīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ na limpanti dehārambhakatvena na badhnanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:573: evaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nirākṛtya bhoktṛtvaṃ nirākaroti na me mamāpta-kāmasya karma-phale spṛhā tṛṣṇā āpta-kāmasya kā spṛhā iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:574: kartṛtvābhimāna-phala-spṛhābhyāṃ hi karmāṇi limpanti tad-abhāvān na māṃ karmāṇi limpantīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:575: evaṃ yo 'nyo 'pi mām akartāram abhoktāraṃ cātmatvenābhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate 'kartrātma-jñānena mucyata ity arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:576: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv etat tāvad āstām, samprati tvaṃ kṣatriya-kule 'vatīrṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:578: tatra kā vārtā ity ata āha na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:579: na limpanti jīvam iva na liptīkurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:581: parameśvaratvena svānanda-pūrṇatve 'pi loka-pravartanārtham eva me karmādi-karaṇam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:583: yas tu na jānāti sa karmabhir badhyata iti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c04u:584: baladevaḥ : etad viśadayati na mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:585: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ na limpanti vaiṣamyādi-doṣeṇa jīvam iva liptaṃ na kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:586: yat tāni sṛjya-jīva-karma-prayuktāni na ca mat-prayuktāni na ca sargādi-karma-phale mama spṛhāsty ato na limpantīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:587: phala-spṛhayā yaḥ karmāṇi karoti sa tat-phalair lipyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:589: parjanyavan nimitta-mātraḥ san tat-karmāṇi pravartayāmīti | smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c04u:591: pradhāna-kāraṇībhūtā yato vai sṛjya-śaktayaḥ || ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c04u:592_0: sṛjyānāṃ deva-mānavādi-bhāva-bhājāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ sarga-kriyāyām asau pareśo nimitta-mātram
GE07bhg4c04u:592_1: eva devādi-bhāva-vaicitryāṃ kāraṇībhūtās tu sṛjyānāṃ teṣāṃ prācīna-karma-śaktaya
GE07bhg4c04u:593: evam āha sūtrakṛt - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyena [Vs. 2.1.35] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c04u:594: evaṃ jñānasya phalam āha iti mām iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:595: itthambhūtaṃ māṃ yo 'bhijānāti, sa tad-virodhibhis tad-dhetubhiḥ prācīna-karmabhir na badhyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:599: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:600: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:602: ye yathā mām ity ādi caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ prāsaṅgikam īśvarasya vaiṣamyaṃ parihṛtya pūrvoktam eva karma-yogaṃ prapañcayitum anusmārayati evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:603: ahaṅkārādi-rāhityena kṛtaṃ karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:604: ity evaṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api mumukṣubhiḥ sattva-śuddhy-arthaṃ pūrvataraṃ yugāntareṣv api kṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:605: tasmāt tvam api prathamaṃ karmaiva kuru ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:607: yato nāhaṃ kartā na me karma-phala-spṛheti jñānāt karmabhir na badhyate 'ta āha evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:608: evam ātmano 'kartuḥ karmālepaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair atikrāntair api asmin yuge yayāti-yadu-prabhṛtibhir mumukṣubhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:609: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva kuru na tūṣṇīm āsanaṃ nāpi saṃnyāsam |
GE07bhg4c04u:610: yady atattvavit tadātma-śuddhy-arthaṃ tattva-vic cel loka-saṅgrahārtham |
GE07bhg4c04u:611: pūrvair janakādibhiḥ pūrvataram atipūrvaṃ yugāntare kṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:612: etenāsmin yuge 'nya-yuge ca pūrva-pūrvataraiḥ kṛtatvād avaśyaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ karmeti darśayati ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:614: evambhūtam eva māṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api loka-pravartanārtham eva karma kṛtam ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:616: mām eva jñātvā tad-anusāribhir mac-chiṣyaiḥ pūrvair vivasvad-ādibhir mumukṣubhir niṣkāmaṃ karma kṛtam |
GE07bhg4c04u:617: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva tat kuru |
GE07bhg4c04u:619: aśuddha-cittaś cej jñāna-garbhāyai citta-śuddhyai śuddha-cittaś cel loka-saṅgrahāyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:620: kīdṛśaṃ pūrvais taiḥ kṛtaṃ ? pūrvataraṃ atiprācīnam ||15||
GE07bhg4c04u:623: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:624: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:625: śrīdharaḥ : tac ca tattvavidbhiḥ saha vicārya kartavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:630: ato yaj jñātā yad-anuṣṭhāyāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasi tat karmākarma ca tubhyam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:632: nanu karma-viṣaye kiṃ kaścit saṃśayo 'py asti yena pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbadhnāsi ?
GE07bhg4c04u:634_0: nau-sthasya niṣkriyeṣv api taṭastha-vṛkṣeṣu gamana-bhrama-darśanāt tathā dūrāc cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:634_1: gacchatsv api puruṣeṣv agamana-bhrama-darśanāt paramārthataḥ kiṃ karma kiṃ vā paramārthato
GE07bhg4c04u:634_2: 'karmeti kavayo medhāvino 'py atrāsmin viṣaye mohitā mohaṃ nirṇayāsāmarthyaṃ prāptā
GE07bhg4c04u:635: tat tasmāt te tubhyam ahaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:636: a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa cchedād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa sandehocchedena vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c04u:637: yat karmākarma-svarūpaṃ jñātvā mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasy aśubhāt saṃsārāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:638: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca karmāpi na gatānugatika-nyāyenaiva kevalaṃ vivekinā kartavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:639: kintu tasya prakāra-viśeṣaṃ jñātvaivety atas tasya prathamaṃ durjñeyatvam āha ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:641: nanu kiṃ karma-viṣayakaḥ kaścit sandeho 'py asti yataḥ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbandhād bravīṣīti ced asty evety āha kiṃ karmeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:642: mumukṣubhir anuṣṭheyaṃ karma kiṃ rūpaṃ syād akarma ca karmānyat tad-antargataṃ jñānaṃ ca kiṃ rūpam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:644: atrārthe kavayo dhīmanto 'pi mohitās tad-yāthātmya-nirṇayāsāmarthyān mohaṃ prāpuḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:645: ahaṃ sarveśaḥ sarvajñas te tubhyaṃ tat karma a-kāra-praśleṣād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvānuṣṭhāya prāpya cāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase ||16||
GE07bhg4c04u:648: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:649: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c04u:650: śrīdharaḥ : nanu loka-prasiddham eva karma dehādi-vyāpārātmakam |
GE07bhg4c04u:652: ataḥ katham ucyate kavayo 'py atra mohaṃ prāptā iti ? tatrāha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:661: nanu sarva-loka-prasiddhatvād aham evaitaj jānāmi dehendriyādi-vyāpāraḥ karma tūṣṇīm āsanam akarmeti tatra kiṃ tvayā vaktavyam iti tatrāha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:662: hi yasmāt karmaṇaḥ śāstra-vihitasyāpi tattvaṃ boddhavyam asti,
GE07bhg4c04u:670: tathākarmaṇaḥ karmākaraṇasyāpi sannyāsinaḥ kīdṛśaṃ karmākaraṇaṃ śubhadam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:671: anyathā niḥśreyasaṃ kathaṃ hasta-gataṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:675: baladevaḥ : nanu kavayo 'pi mohaṃ prāpur iti cet tatrāha karmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:676: karmaṇo niṣkāmasya mumukṣubhir anuṣṭhātavyasya svarūpaṃ boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:678: akarmaṇaś ca karma-bhinnasya jñānasya ca svarūpaṃ boddhavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:684: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:685: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna-karma-kṛt ||18||
GE07bhg4c04u:686: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ karmādīnāṃ durvijñeyatvaṃ darśayann āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:687: parameśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇe karmaṇi karma-viṣaye akarma karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:689: akarmaṇi ca vihitākaraṇe karma yaḥ paśyet pratyavāyotpādakatvena bandha-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:690: manuṣyeṣu karma kurvāṇeṣu sa buddhimān vyavasāyātmaka-buddhimattvāc chreṣṭhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:694_0: sarvataḥ samplutodaka-sthānīye ca tasmin karmaṇi sarva-karma-phalānām antarbhāvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:694_1: tad evam ārurukṣoḥ karma-yogādhikārāvasthāyāṃ na karmaṇām anārambhād ity ādinokta
GE07bhg4c04u:697: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā yaḥ karmānupayoga uktas tasyāpy arthāt prapañcaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:698: yad ārurukṣor api karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati tad-ārūḍhasya kuto bandhakaṃ syāt ity atrāpi śloko yujyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:700_0: karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vartamāne 'py ātmano dehādi-vyatirekānubhavena akarma
GE07bhg4c04u:700_1: svābhāvikaṃ niaṣkarmyam eva yaḥ paśyet tathā akarmaṇi ca jñāna-rahite duḥkha-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c04u:700_2: karmaṇāṃ tyāge karma yaḥ paśyet tasya prayatna-sādhyatvena mithyācāratvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:702: ya evambhūtaḥ sa tu sarveṣu manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:703: tatra hetuḥ - yataḥ kṛtsnāni sarvāṇi yadṛcchayā prāptāny āhārādīni karmāṇi kurvann api sa yukta eva akartrātma-jñānena samādhistha evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:704: anenanaiva jñāninaḥ svabhāvād āpannaṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādikaṃ na doṣāya |
GE07bhg4c04u:705: ajñasya tu rāgataḥ kṛtaṃ doṣāya iti vikarmaṇo 'pi tattvaṃ nirūpitaṃ draṣṭavyam ||18||
GE07bhg4c04u:706: madhusūdanaḥ : kīdṛśaṃ tarhi karmādīnāṃ tattvam iti tad āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:707: karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vihite pratiṣiddhe cāhaṃ karomīti dharmy-adhyāsenātmany āropit## |
GE07bhg4c04u:708: nau-sthenācalatsu taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣu samāropite calana ivākartātma-svarūpālocanena vastutaḥ karmābhāvaṃ taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣv iva yaḥ paśyet paśyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:709_0: tathā dehendriyādiṣu triguṇa-māyā-pariṇāmatvena sarvadā savyāpāreṣu nirvyāpāras tūṣṇīṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:709_1: sukham āsa ity abhimānena samāropite 'karmaṇi vyāpāroparame dūrastha-cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭa-puruṣeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:709_2: gacchatsv apy agamana iva sarvadā sa-vyāpāra-dehendriyādi-svarūpa-paryālocanena vastu-gatyā
GE07bhg4c04u:709_3: karma nivṛttyākhya-prayatna-rūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ yaḥ paśyed udāhṛta-puruṣeṣu gamanam iva |
GE07bhg4c04u:712: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī sa buddhimān ity ādinā buddhimattva-yoga-yuktatva-sarva-karma-kṛttvais tribhir dharmaiḥ stūyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:713: atra prathama-pādena karma-vikarmaṇos tattvaṃ karma-śabdasya vihita-pratiṣiddha-paratvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:714: dvitīya-pādena cākarmaṇas tattvaṃ darśitam iti draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:715: tatra yat tvaṃ manyase karmaṇo bandha-hetutvāt tūṣṇīm eva mayā sukhena sthātavyam iti tan mṛṣā |
GE07bhg4c04u:716: asati kartṛtvābhimāne vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya vā karmaṇo bandha-hetutvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:717: tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti [Gītā 4.14] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c04u:718: satica kartṛtvābhimāne tūṣṇīm aham āsa ity audāsīnyābhimānātmakaṃ yat karma tad api bandha-hetur eva vastu-tattvāparijñānāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:719: tasmāt karma-vikarmākarmaṇāṃ tattvam īdṛśaṃ jñātvā vikarmākarmaṇī parityajya kartṛtvābhimāna-phalābhisandhi-hānena vihitaṃ karmaiva kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:720: aparā vyākhyā karmaṇi jñāna-karmaṇi dṛśye jaḍe sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarva-bhramādhiṣṭhānam akarmāvedyaṃ sva-prakāśa-caitanyaṃ paramārtha-dṛṣṭyā yaḥ paśyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:721: tathākarmaṇi ca sva-prakāśe dṛg-vastuni kalpitaṃ karma dṛśyaṃ māyā-mayaṃ na paramārtha-sat |
GE07bhg4c04u:723: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmany evānupaśyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:724: sarva-bhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vijugupsate || [ĪśaU 6] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:725: evaṃ parasparādhyāse 'pi śuddhaṃ vastu yaḥ paśyati manuṣyeṣu madhye sa eva buddhimān nānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:728: ataḥ sa evāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sādhana-kṛtsna-karma-kṛd iti vāstava-dharmair eva stūyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:729: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api paramārtha-darśī bhava tāvataiva kṛtsna-karma-kāritvopapatter ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:730: ato yad uktaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhād iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:731: yac coktaṃ karmādīnāṃ tattvaṃ boddhavyam astīti sa buddhimān ity ādi-stutiś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:734: atattvaṃ cānyan na boddhavyaṃ na vā yaj-jñāne buddhimattvam iti yuktaiva paramārtha-darśināṃ vyākhyā |
GE07bhg4c04u:735: yat tu vyākhyānaṃ karmaṇi nitye parameśvarārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamāne bandha-hetutvābhāvād akarmedam iti yaḥ paśyet |
GE07bhg4c04u:736: tathākarmaṇi ca nitya-karmākaraṇe pratyavāya-hetutvena karmedam iti yaḥ paśyet sa buddhimān ity ādi tad asaṅgatam eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:739: na caitādṛśaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ boddhavyaṃ tattvaṃ nāpy etādṛśa-jñāne buddhimattvādi-stuty-upapattir bhrāntitvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:740: nitya-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ hi svarūpato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāropayujyate na tatrākarma-buddhiḥ kutrāpy upayujyate śāstreṇa nāmādiṣu brahma-dṛṣṭivad avihitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:742: evaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇam api svarūpato nitya-karma-viruddha-karma-lakṣakatayopayujyate na tu
GE07bhg4c04u:747: bhāvārthāḥ karma-śabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hy artho vidhīyata iti nyāyena bhāvārthasyaivāpūrva-janakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:748: atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ na gṛhṇāti ity ādāv api saṅkalpa-viśeṣasyaivāpūrva-janakatvābhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:750: ato nitya-karmānuṣṭhānārhe kāle tad-viruddhatayā yad-upaveśanādi karma tad eva nitya-karmākaraṇopalakṣitaṃ pratyavāya-hetur iti vaidikānāṃ siddhāntaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:751: ataevākurvan vihitaṃ karmety atra lakṣaṇārthe śatā vyākhyātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:752: lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ kriyāyā ity aviśeṣa-smaraṇe 'py atra hetutvānupapatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:755_0: nāpi nityānuṣṭhāna-param evaitad vākyaṃ nityāni kuryād ity arthe karmaṇy akarma yaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:755_1: paśyed ity ādi tad-abodhakaraṃ vākyaṃ prayuñjānasya bhagavataḥ pratārakatvāpatter
GE07bhg4c04u:755_2: ity ādi bhāṣya eva vistareṇa vyākhyātam ity uparamyate ||18 ||
GE07bhg4c04u:756: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra karmākarmaṇos tattva-bodham āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:757: śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya jñānavattve 'pi janakāder ivākṛta-sannyāsasya karmaṇy anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge akarma |
GE07bhg4c04u:758: karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet tat-karmaṇo bandhakatvābhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:759: tathāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya jñānābhāve 'pi śāstrajñatvāt jñāna-vāvadūkasya sannyāsino 'karmaṇi karmākaraṇe karma paśyet durgati-prāpakaṃ karma-bandham evopalabhate |
GE07bhg4c04u:762: na tu tasya jñāna-vāvadūkasya jñāni-māninaḥ saṅgenāpi tad-vacasāpi sannyāsaṃ na karotīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:766: surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā |
GE07bhg4c04u:768: baladevaḥ : karmākarmaṇor boddhavyaṃ svarūpam āha karmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:769: anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāme karmaṇi yo 'karma prastutatvāt karmaṇy ātma-jñānaṃ paśyet,

GE07bhg4c04u:985: evaṃ vivekatavatā puṃsā brahmaiva gantavyaṃ, na tu phalāntaram |
GE07bhg4c04u:986: kutaḥ ? brahmātmakaṃ yat karma tatraiva samādhiś cittaikāgryaṃ yasya tena ||24||
GE07bhg4c04u:988: evaṃ vivikta-jīvātmānusandhi-garbhatayā sva-vihitasya karmaṇo jñānākāratām abhidhāya sāṅgasya tasya parātma-rūpatānusandhinā tad-ākāratām āha brahmārpaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:989: arpyate 'nenātmaiveti vyutpatter arpaṇaṃ sruvaṃ mantrādhidaivataṃ cendrādi tat tac ca brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:990: arpyamāṇaṃ haviś cājyādi tad api brahmaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:991: tac ca havir homādhāre 'gnau brahmaṇi yajamānenādhvaryuṇā ca brahmaṇā hutaṃ tyaktaṃ prakṣiptaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:994: na ca samastaṃ padam iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c04u:995_0: agnau brahma-dṛṣṭer vidheyatvād itthaṃ ca brahma-rūpe sāṅge karmaṇi samādhiś cittaikāgryaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:995_1: yasya tena mumukṣuṇā brahmaiva gantavyaṃ sva-svarūpaṃ para-svarūpaṃ ca labhyam avalokyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:996: vijñānaṃ brahma ced veda ity ādau
GE07bhg4c04u:998: vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma ity ādau paramātmani ca brahmārpaṇatvādi-guṇa-yogān nāsya prakaraṇasya paunaruktam |
GE07bhg4c04u:999: sruv-ādīnāṃ brahmatvaṃ tad-āyatta-vṛttikatvāt tad-vāpyatvāc ca iti vyākhyātāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1000: tādṛśatayānusandhitaṃ karma-jñānākāraṃ sat tad avalokanāya kalpyate ||24||
GE07bhg4c04u:1006_0: etad eva yajñatvena sampāditaṃ sarvatra brahma-darśana-lakṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ sarva-yajñopāya-prāpyatvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:1006_1: sarva-yajñebhyaḥ śreṣṭham ity evaṃ stotum adhikāri-bhedena jñānopāya-bhūtān bahūn
GE07bhg4c04u:1006_2: yajñān āha daivam ity ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1009: taṃ daivam eva yajñam apare karma-yoginaḥ paryupāsate śraddhayānutiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1010: apare tu jñāna-yogino brahma-rūpe 'gnau apare yajñenaivopāyena brahmārpaṇam ity ādy ukta-prakāreṇa yajñam upajuhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1014: adhunā samyag-darśanasya yajña-rūpatvena stāvakatayā brahmārpaṇa-mantre sthite punar api tasya stuty-artham itarāny ajñān upanyasyati daivam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1015: devā indrāgny-ādaya ijyante yena sa daivas tam eva yajñaṃ darśa-pūrṇamāsa-jyotiṣṭomādi-rūpam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate sarvadā kurvanti na jñāna-yajñam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1016_0: evaṃ karma-yajñam uktvāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tat-phala-bhūtaṃ jñāna-yajñam āha
GE07bhg4c04u:1016_2: tasminn agnau yajñaṃ pratyag ātmānaṃ tva-padārthaṃ yajñenaiva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1023: jīva-brahmābheda-darśanaṃ yajñatvena sampādya tat-sādhana-yajña-madhye paṭhyate śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaa ity ādinā stotum ||25||
GE07bhg4c04u:1024: viśvanāthaḥ : yajñāḥ khalu bhedenānye 'pi bahavo vartante |
GE07bhg4c04u:1025: tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha daivam evety aṣṭabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1026: devā indra-varuṇādaya ijyante yasmin taṃ daivam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1030: apare jñāna-yoginas tu brahma paramātmaivāgnis tasmiṃs tat-padārthe yajñaṃ haviḥ-sthānīyaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ jīvaṃ yajñena praṇava-rūpeṇa mantreṇaiva juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1032: atra yajñaṃ yajñena iti śabdau karma-karaṇa-sādhanau prathamātiśayoktyā śuddha-jīva-praṇavāvāhatuḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c04u:1034: evaṃ brahmānusandhi-garbhatayā ca karmaṇo jñānākāratāṃ nirūpya karma-yoga-bhedān āha daivam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1035: daivam indrādi-devārcana-rūpaṃ yajñam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate tatraiva niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1036: apare brahmārpaṇaṃ ity ādi-nyāyena brahma-bhūtāgnāv yajñena sruvādinā yajñaṃ ghṛtādi-havī-rūpaṃ juhvati homa eva niṣṭhāṃ kurvatīty arthaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c04u:1042: anye naiṣṭhikī brahmacāriṇas tat-tad-indriya-saṃyama-rūpeṣv agniṣu śrotrādīni juhvati pravilāpayanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1046: viṣaya-bhoga-samaye 'py anāsaktāḥ santo 'gnitvena bhāviteṣv indriyeṣu haviṣṭvena bhāvitān śabdādīn prakṣipantīty arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1048: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juhvati śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1050: saṃyamaḥ saṃyataṃ mana evāgnayas teṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1052: anye tato nyūnā brahmacāriṇaḥ śabdādīn viṣayāni indriyāgniṣv indriyāṇy evāgnayas teṣu juhvati śabdādīnīndriyeṣu pravilāpayantīty arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1054: śrotrādīnīty anye naiṣṭhika-brahmacāriṇaḥ saṃyamāgniṣu tat-tad-ndriya-saṃyama-rūpeṣv agniṣu śrotrādīni juhvati tāni nirudhya saṃyama-pradhānās tiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1055: anye gṛhiṇa indriyāgniṣv agnitvena bhāviteṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādīn upajuhvati anāsaktyā tān bhuñjānās tāni tat-pravaṇāni kurvanti ||26||
GE07bhg4c04u:1070: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1072: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ || [Gheraṇḍa-saṃhitā 5.64|
GE07bhg4c04u:1077: tasmin jñānena dhyeya-viṣayeṇa dīpite prajvalite dhyeyaṃ samyag jñātvā tasmin manaḥ saṃyamya tāni sarvāṇi karmāṇy uparamayantīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1080: sarvāṇīndriyāṇi tat-karmāṇi śravaṇa-darśanāni sarvāṇīndriya-karmāṇi prāṇa-karmāṇi cāpare ātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau juhvati jñāna-dīpite ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1089: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1091: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ || [Gheraṇḍa-saṃhitā 5.64|
GE07bhg4c04u:1093: ātmanas tvaṃ-padārthasya saṃyamaḥ śuddhir evāgnis tasmin juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1095: ekaḥ pratyag ātmaivāsti, nānye mana ādāya iti bhāvayantīty arthaḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1097: apare indriya-karmāṇi prāṇa-karmāṇi cātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau ca juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1098: ātmano manasaḥ saṃyamaḥ sa eva yogas tasminn agnitvena bhāvite juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1099: manasā indriyāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ ca karma-pravaṇatāṃ nivārayituṃ prayatante |
GE07bhg4c04u:1100: indriyāṇāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ karmāṇi śabda-grahaṇādīni prāṇa-karmāṇi prāṇasya bahir-gamanaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:1104: udānasyordhva-nayanaṃ cety evaṃ bodhyāni sarvāṇi sāmastyena jñāna-dīpite ātmānusandhānojjvalite ||27||
GE07bhg4c04u:1110: dravya-dānam eva yajño yeṣāṃ te dravya-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1111: kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi tapa eva yajño yeṣāṃ te eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1112: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1113: svādhyāyena vedena śravaṇa-mananādinā yat tad artha-jñānaṃ tad eva yajño yeṣāṃ te svādhyāya-jñāna-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1114: yad vā veda-pāṭha-yajñās tad-artha-jñāna-yajñāś ceti dvividhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1116: samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te ||28||
GE07bhg4c04u:1118: dravya-yajñās tapo-yajñā yoga-yajñās tathāpare svādhyāya-jñāna-yajñāś ca yatayaḥ saṃśita-vratāḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c04u:1119: viśvanāthaḥ : dravya-dānam eva yajño yeṣāṃ te dravya-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1120: tapaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādy eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1121: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1122: svādhyāyo vedasya pāṭhas tad-arthasya jñānaṃ ca yajño yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c04u:1124: sarva ete samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te ||28||
GE07bhg4c04u:1138: tathā kumbhakena prāṇāpānayor ūrdhvādho-gatī ruddhvā recaka-kāle 'pānaṃ prāṇe juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1139: evaṃ pūraka-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇā apara ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1141: apare tv āhāra-saṅkocam abhyasyantaḥ svayam eva jīryamāṇeṣv indriyeṣu tat-tad-indriya-vṛtti-layaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1142_0: yad vā - apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpara ity anena pūraka-recakayor āvartamānayor
GE07bhg4c04u:1142_1: haṃsaḥ so 'ham ity anulomataḥ pratilomataś ca abhivyajyamānenājapā-mantreṇa tat-ttvaṃ-padārthaikyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1144: sa-kāreṇa bahir yāti haṃ-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1145: prāṇas tatra sa evāhaṃ haṃsa ity anucintayet || iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1146: prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvety anena tu ślokena prāṇāyāma-yajñā aparaiḥ kathyante |
GE07bhg4c04u:1147: tatrāyam arthaḥ - dvau bhāgau pūrayed annair jalenaikaṃ prapūrayet |
GE07bhg4c04u:1149: evam ādi-vacanokto niyata āhāro yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c04u:1150: kumbhakena prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ santaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1151: kumbhake hi sarve prāṇā ekībhavantīti tatraiva layamāneṣv indriyeṣu homaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1153: yathā yathā sadābhyāsān manasaḥ sthiratā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c04u:1154: vāyu-vāk-kāya-dṛṣṭīnāṃ sthiratā ca tathā tathā || iti ||29||
GE07bhg4c04u:1156: apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c04u:1158: apare prāṇāyāma-niṣṭhāḥ apāne 'dho-vṛttau prāṇam ūrdhva-vṛttaṃ juhvati pūraka-kāle prāṇam apānenaikīkurvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1160: kumbhaka-kāle prāṇāpānayor gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1162: niyatāhārā alpāhārāḥ prāṇeṣv āhāra-saṅkocanenaiva jīvyamāneṣu prāṇān indriyāṇi juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1163: indriyāṇāṃ prāṇādhīna-vṛttitvāt prāṇa-daurbalye sati svayam eva sva-sva-viṣaya-grahaṇāsamarthānīndriyāṇi prāṇeṣv evālpīyanta ity arthaḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c04u:1165: tathāpare prāṇāyāma- parāyaṇās te tridhā adho-vṛttāv apāne prāṇam ūrdhva-vṛttiṃ juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1167: tathā prāṇe 'pānaṃ juhvati recakenāpānaṃ prāṇena sahaikīkṛtya bahir nirgamayanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1168: yathā prāṇāpānayor gatī śvāsa-praśvāsau kumbhakena ruddhvā vartanta iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1169: āntarasya vāyor nāsāsyena bahir nirgamaḥ śvāsaḥ prāṇasya gatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1171: tayor nirodhaḥ kumbhakaḥ sa dvividhaḥ vāyum āpūrya śvāsa-praśvāsayor nirodho 'ntaḥ-kumbhakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1172: vāyuṃ virecya tayor nirodho bhaiḥ kumbhakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1173: apare nityatāhārāḥ bhojana-saṅkocaam abhyasyantaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1174: teṣv alpāhāreṇa jīryamāṇeṣu tad-āyatta-vṛttikāni tāni viṣaya-grahaṇākṣamāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:1180: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1183: yajñaiḥ kṣayitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yais te ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1184: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśadhā yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1185: yajñān vidanti jānanti vindanti labhante veti yajña-vido yajñānāṃ jñātāraḥ kartāraś ca |
GE07bhg4c04u:1186: yajñaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ kṣapitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ pāpaṃ yeṣāṃ te yajña-kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1187: yajñān kṛtvāvaśiṣṭe kāle 'nnam amṛta-śabda-vācyaṃ bhuñjata iti yajña-śiṣṭāmṛta-bhujaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1188: te sarve 'pi sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa yānti brahma sanātanaṃ nityaṃ saṃsārān mucyanta ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1190: sarve 'py ete yajña-vida ukta-lakṣaṇān yajñān vindamānāḥ santo jñāna-dvārā brahma yānti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1191: atrānanusaṃhitaṃ phalam āha yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yajñāvaśiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtaṃ bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādikaṃ tad bhuñjata iti ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1192: baladevaḥ : ete khalv indirya-vijaya-kāmāḥ sarve 'pīti yajña-vidaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1193: pūrvoktān devādi-yajñān vindamānā tair eva yajñaiḥ kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c04u:1199: yajñān kṛtvā avaśiṣṭe kāle 'niṣiddham annam amṛta-rūpaṃ bhuñjata iti tathā |
GE07bhg4c04u:1200: te sanātanaṃ nityaṃ brahma jñāna-dvāreṇa prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1204: ato yajñāḥ sarvathā kartavyā ity arthaḥ ||31||
GE07bhg4c04u:1205: madhusūdanaḥ : evam anvaye guṇam uktvā vyatireke doṣam āha yejñety ardhena |
GE07bhg4c04u:1206: uktānāṃ yajñānāṃ madhye 'nyatamo 'pi yajño yasya nāsti so 'yajñas tasyāyam alpa-sukho 'pi manuṣya-loko nāsti sarva-nindyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c04u:1208: viśvanāthaḥ : tathānusaṃhitaṃ phalam āha brahma yāntīti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1211: kuto 'nyo devādi-lokas tena prāptavya ity arthaḥ ||31||
GE07bhg4c04u:1213: yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtam annādi bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādi ca tad-bhuñjānāḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1218: evaṃ bahu-vidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe |
GE07bhg4c04u:1219: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1220: śrīdharaḥ : jñāna-yajñaṃ stotum uktān yajñān upasaṃharati evaṃ bahu-vidhā iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1223: tathāpi tān sarvān vāṅ-manaḥ-kāya-karma-janitān ātma-svarūpa-saṃsparśa-rahitān viddhi jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c04u:1225: evaṃ jñātvā jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ san saṃsārād vimukto bhaviṣyasi ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1226: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ tvayā svotprekṣā-mātreṇaivam ucyate na hi veda evātra pramāṇam ity āha evam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1227: evaṃ yathoktā bahu-vidhā bahu-prakārā yajñāḥ sarva-vaidika-śreyaḥ-sādhana-rūpā vitatā vistṛtā brahmaṇo vedasya mukhe dvāre veda-dvāreṇaivaite 'vagatā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1229: karmajān kāyika-vācika-mānasa-karmodbhavān viddhi jānīhi tān sarvān yajñān nātmajān |
GE07bhg4c04u:1230: nirvyāpāro hy ātmā na tad-vyāpārā ete kintu nirvyāpāro 'ham udāsīna ity evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase 'smāt saṃsāra-bandhanād iti śeṣaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1231: viśvanāthaḥ : brahmaṇo vedasya mukhena vedena svamukhenaiva spaṣṭam uktā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1237: evaṃ jñātvā tad-upāyatayā tenoktān tān avabudhyānuṣṭhāya tad-utpanna-vijñānenāvalokitātma-dvayaḥ saṃsārād vimokṣyase ||32||
GE07bhg4c04u:1242: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yajñāj jñāna-yajñas tu śreṣṭha ity āha śreyān iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1243: dravya-mayād anātma-vyāpāra-janyād daivādi-yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ |

GE07bhg4c04u:1444: saṃyatāni viṣayebhyo nivartitānīndriyāṇi yena sa saṃyatendriyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1445: ya evaṃ viśeṣaṇa-traya-yuktaḥ so 'vaśyaṃ jñānaṃ labhate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1447: śraddhāvattvādis tv aikāntika upāya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1448: īdṛśenopāyena jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ caramāṃ śāntim avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛtti-rūpāṃ muktim acireṇa tad-avyavadhānenaivādhigacchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1449_0: yathā hi dīpaḥ svotpatti-mātreṇaivāndhakāra-nivṛttiṃ karoti na tu kaṃcit sahakāriṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:1449_1: apekṣate tathā jñānam api svotpatti-mātreṇaivājñāna-nivṛttiṃ karoti na tu kiṃcit
GE07bhg4c04u:1450: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi kīdṛśaḥ san kadā prāpnotīty ata āha śraddhāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1451: śraddhā niṣkāma-karmaṇaivāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhyaiva jñānaṃ syād iti śāstrārthaṃ āstikya-buddhis tadvān eva |
GE07bhg4c04u:1452: tat-paras tad-anuṣṭhāna-niṣṭhas tādṛśo 'pi yadā saṃyatendriyaḥ syāt tadā parāṃ śāntim saṃsāra-nāśam ||39||
GE07bhg4c04u:1453: baladevaḥ : kīdṛśaḥ san kadā vindatīty āha śraddhāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1454: niṣkāmena karmaṇā hṛd-viśuddhau jñānaṃ syād iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1456: tat-paras tad-anuṣṭhāna-niṣṭhas tādṛg api yadā saṃyatendriyas tadā parāṃ śāntim muktim ||39||
GE07bhg4c04u:1460: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1461: śrīdharaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇam uktvā tad-viparītam anadhikāriṇam āha ajñaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1464: jātāyām api śraddhāyāṃ mamedaṃ siddhen na veti aṃśayākrānta-cittaś ca vinaśyate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1466: eteṣu triṣv api saṃśayātmā sarvathā naśyati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1469: na ca sukhaṃ saṃśayenaaiva bhogasyāpy asambhavāt ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1470: madhusūdanaḥ : atra ca saṃśayo na kartavyaḥ, kasmāt ? ajña iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1472: guru-vedānta-vākyārtha idam evaṃ na bhavaty eveti viparyaya-rūpā nāstikya-buddhir aśraddhā tadvān aśraddadhānaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1473: idam evaṃ bhavati na veti sarvatra saṃśayākrānta-cittaḥ saṃśayātmā vinaśyati svārthād bhraṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c04u:1474: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca vinaśyatīti saṃśayātmāpekṣayā nyūnatva-kathanārthaṃ cakārābhyāṃ tayoḥ prayogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1476: saṃśayātmā hi sarvataḥ pāpīyān yato nāyaṃ manuṣya-loko 'sti vittārjanādy-abhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:1478: na sukhaṃ bhojanādi-kṛtaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ sarvatra sandehākrānta-cittasya |
GE07bhg4c04u:1479: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca paro loko nāsti manuṣya-loko bhojanādi-sukhaṃ ca vartate | saṃśayātmā
GE07bhg4c04u:1480: tu tritaya-hīnatvena sarvataḥ pāpīyān ity arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1481: viśvanāthaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇam uktvā tad-viparītādhikāriṇam āha ajñaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1483: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñānavattve 'pi nānā-vādināṃ paraspara-vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā na kvāpi viśvastaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1484: śraddhāvattve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat sidhyen na veti sandehākrānt-matiḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1485: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ viśeṣato nindati nāyam iti ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1486: baladevaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇaṃ tat-phalaṃ cābhidhāya tad-viparītaṃ tat-phalaṃ cāha ajñaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1488: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñāne saty api vivādi-pratipattibhir na kvāpi viśvastaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:1489: śraddadhānatve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat siddhyen na veti sandihāna-manā vinaśyati svārthād vicyavate |
GE07bhg4c04u:1490: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ vinindati nāyam iti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1491: ayaṃ prākṛto lokaḥ paro 'prākṛtaḥ saṃśayātmanaḥ kiṃcid api sukhaṃ nāsti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1492: śāstrīya-karma-janyaṃ hi sukhaṃ, tac ca karma viviktātma-jñāna-pūrvakam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1493: tatra sandihānasya kutas tad ity arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c04u:1499: adhyāya-dvayoktāṃ pūrvāpara-bhūmikā-bhedena karma-jñāna-mayīṃ dvividhāṃ brahma-niṣṭhām upasaṃharati yogeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c04u:1500: yogena parameśvarārādhana-rūpeṇa tasmin saṃnyastāni karmāṇi yena taṃ karmāṇi sva-phalair na nibadhnanti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1501: tataś ca jñānena ātma-bodhena kartrā saṃchinnaḥ saṃsāro dehādy-atimāna-lakṣaṇo yasya tam ātmavantam apramādinaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni svātāvikāni vā na nibadhnanti ||41||
GE07bhg4c04u:1503_0: etādṛśaysya sarvānartha-mūlasya saṃśayasya nirākaraṇāyātma-niścayam upāyaṃ vadann
GE07bhg4c04u:1504: yogena bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇa-samatva-buddhi-rūpeṇa saṃnyastāni bhagavati samarpitāni karmāṇi yena |
GE07bhg4c04u:1505: yad vā paramārtha-darśana-lakṣaṇena yogena saṃnyastāni tyaktāni karmāṇi yena taṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1506: saṃśaye sati kathaṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmatvam ata āha jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayaṃ jñānenātma-niścaya-lakṣaṇena cchinnaḥ saṃśayo yena tam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1507: viṣaya-para-vaśatva-svarūpa-prasāde sati kuto jñānotpattir ity ata āha ātmavantam apramādinaṃ sarvadā sāvadhānam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1509: yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpāṇi vā na nibadhnanti aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ vā śarīraṃ nārabhante he dhanaṃjaya ||41||
GE07bhg4c04u:1511: naiṣkarmyaṃ tv etādṛśasya syād ity āha yogān niṣkāma-karma-yogānantaram eva saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ saṃnyāsena tyakta-karmāṇam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1514: baladevaḥ : īdṛśasya naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇā siddhiḥ syād ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c04u:1515: yogena yoga-sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi ity atroktena saṃnyastāni jñānākāratāpannāni karmāṇi yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c04u:1524: yasmād evaṃ tasmād ātmano 'jñānena saṃbhūtaṃ hṛdi-sthitam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ śokādi-nimittaṃ dehātma-viveka-khaḍgena chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya |
GE07bhg4c04u:1526: he bhārateti kṣatriyatvena yuddhasya dharmatvaṃ darśitam ||42||
GE07bhg4c04u:1528: niṣṭhoktā yena taṃ vande śauriṃ saṃśaya-saṃchidam ||
GE07bhg4c04u:1532: tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata ||42||
GE07bhg4c04u:1536: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gataṃ saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya |
GE07bhg4c04u:1541: gītāsv ayaṃ caturtho hi saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||4||
GE07bhg4c04u:1543: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gatam ātma-viṣayakaṃ saṃśayaṃ mad-upadiṣṭena jñānāsinā chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāmaṃ karma mayopadiṣṭam ātiṣṭha |
GE07bhg4c04u:1545: dvy-aṃśakaṃ dhānyavat karma tuṣāṃśād iva taṇḍulaḥ |
GE07bhg4c04u:1546: śreṣṭhaṃ dravyāṃśato jñānam iti turyasya nirṇayaḥ ||4||
